Grace has been kidnapped! What do I do?
Check the scene of the crime for clues!
Malia has left you a note on the desk?better read it.
The ceremony is starting and they’re going to kill Grace! How can I stop Tetelo?
You didn’t go all the way to Africa for nothing, did you?
Use the Talisman on Tetelo!
I used the Talisman, but then Dr. John killed me!
You didn’t come in alone, did you? That wasn’t a great idea. You and Mosely were going to do this together!
To make sure Mosely is with you, place the snake rod and the signal device under the kneeler in the confessional.
Tetelo is threatening to kill Mosely and Grace unless I give her the Talisman. She even destroyed Mosely’s gun!
She is very powerful right now. But you have something that can protect them against her.
Throw the Talisman to Mosely so he can escape with Grace.
My friends are safe, but I’m in big trouble. Tetelo’s going to kill me and Malia can’t fight her off.
There’s something else you need to destroy to weaken Tetelo’s hold. You can’t go anywhere, so it must be nearby.
Destroy the idol inside the sacrificial table.
There’s an earthquake! Malia’s hanging on for her life?but Tetelo is still here too. What do I do?
Gabriel has a very difficult choice to make here. Save his love, or destroy his family’s enemy?
Gabriel can attack Tetelo or leave her and Malia to die?but she’ll bring him down with her. If Gabriel tries to save Malia, he can still walk out of this alive.
I'm not confident that Mosely will be able to find and access the hounfour like we planned.
You need to leave a signal for him, as well as the means to enter the hounfour.
Place the signal device and snake rod under the kneeler in the confessional.
Mosely’s alive! But we need a plan.
You certainly do. Talk to him so you can catch up on what’s been going on first. Then you can figure out your next moves and what you’ll need.
After you catch him up and he catches you up, you can talk about making a plan. When you’re done talking, give him the signal device.
I need to find the secret voodoo hounfour, but I don’t know where to look.
Gabriel noticed one of the city’s landmarks when he was flying back in. The Gedde hounfour is a wheel-within-a-wheel design. Have you seen that anywhere?
Jackson Square has a wheel-within-a-wheel shape. The underground cartel is beneath the Square.
I know where the hounfour is, but how do I get there?
They must have a secret entrance near the Square. Someplace no one would expect to find snake-obsessed thieves and murderers sneaking off into an underground lair.
The entrance is in the confessional of St. Louis Cathedral. Use the snake rod in the knothole to get there.
I’ve made it to the hounfour, but a lot of the doors are locked. How do I get into these rooms?
Those rooms are closed off to all but the most important members of the cartel. You’ll need to steal something from one of them.
Steal Dr. John’s keycard from his room.
I need to get by Dr. John in his room. How do I do this?
There’s no way you can take him in a fight. You’ll have to distract him and sneak in while he’s not looking. Think you can get him out of the room for a while?
Use the drums in the Inner Circle to “Summon Brother Eagle.” Then sneak into his room quickly while he’s gone.
How do I summon Dr. John on the drums?
You certainly don’t want to summon everyone. You need to know how to call only him. There must be a code you can use for that.
Look in the offices for the record book. That has the drum code for Doctor John’s tribal name, “Brother Eagle.”
I found Grace, but she won’t wake up!
It’ll take something more powerful than a good shake to wake her up.
Use the Talisman on Grace to wake her up.
Dr. John found me in Grace’s room and killed me!
You do sort of stand out in that outfit. Find a disguise.
Search the supply room to find a disguise. Put it on before Dr. John comes in.
How do I get started on Day 1?

Talk to Grace and ask her about the highlighted topics. She’ll give you a tip about a good place to visit right away. Also, take a close look in the counter and see if there are any useful items there.
After Grace has told you about the photos at the police station, go to the map and then select the police station. Talk to the desk sergeant inside.
Talk to Officer Frick at the police station about Detective Mosely and then Crime Scene. So there’s a new Voodoo Murders crime scene? Sounds like a place Gabriel wants to be!
How do I find the crime scene?
You need to find a cop who has easy access to that info. How about a local park?
You’ll find a cop at Jackson Square, but you need to get him away from his bike. Look around Jackson Square for someone who can help you (hint: someone annoying).

At Jackson Square, walk over to the mime on the northwest quadrant. The mime will follow Gabriel. Walk the mime over to the cop, avoiding other people that may distract the silent performer, and the mime will distract the cop away from the motorcycle. Operate the radio then to listen in.
I’m at the crime scene. Now what?
Investigate! A crime scene is bound to have clues if you look closely enough, or maybe a trail to follow.

Inspect the ground near the body and you’ll find a pattern in the dirt. That looks like something you might want to copy down. Then inspect the sand closely for clues; there may be things you can’t see with the naked eye.

Use the magnifying glass on the snake trail in the sand. Follow the trail to find the cage marks. Use the magnifying glass to find a snake scale and the tweezers to take it. Use the sketchbook on the pattern of lines in the dirt. You can find the sketchbook in Gabriel’s bookshop on the center table. You get the magnifying glass and tweezers from inside the counter in the center table.
What things do I need to do on Day 1?
Have you visited the crime scene? Did you get two clues from there? Did you ask Grace to do some research for you after visting the area?

Go to the police station to learn about the crime scene. Learn the location of the crime scene by way of the cop in Jackson Square. Visit the crime scene. While there, find the snake scale and copy the pattern into your sketchbook. Ask Grace to research Malia Gedde.
How do I get past the Gedde butler?
Gabriel’s an author and small business owner?not quite important enough to gain entry to the house, as far as the butler is concerned. Try convincing him that you’re more official than you look.
Gabriel needs some new identification. Maybe from a friend with more rank than he has.
Steal Mosely’s badge and use it on the butler.
How do I get Mosely’s badge?

Mosely’s badge never leaves his coat, and his coat never leaves him. First, find a way to make him want to take his coat off. If only he felt uncomfortable keeping it on… Even if Mosely takes his coat off, he’s still going to see if you try to take the badge. There must be a way to make him leave. After all, he is kind of a pushover.
Doesn’t a nice hot cup of coffee sound good? Something to warm you right up!

In the police station lobby, use the thermostat near Mosely’s door. Raise the temperature as high as possible. After Mosely takes his coat off, ask him for a cup of coffee, and take the badge while he’s away.
How do I get a copy of the Voodoo Murders file?

Talk to Mosely about the case and he’ll tell you there were patterns found around all the bodies. After he gives you permission to see the file, talk to Franks. She’ll let you read it, but that’s all. As long as she’s watching you, you won’t be able to make a copy.
Franks is a busy woman, between her office work and being a police photographer. If she were busy taking photos, maybe Gabriel could make that copy. Mosely can help.

Ask Mosely for a cop/author photo. After the first photo, say you need to check your hair. Out in the office, take the file from Franks’ inbox and make a copy of it on the copy machine. Put the file back on Franks’ desk. Or not.
What do I do with the patterns found around the bodies?

You need the partial pattern Gabriel sketched at the crime scene plus a copy of the police file showing the other patterns found at the previous murders. Then you need a way to combine them into one image. Unfortunately, Gabriel’s no artist.
Artists hang out at Jackson Square. Check there.
How can I get the technical artist to help me?
The artist is a friendly guy, but he has a lot of work to do since he lost his sketch and he can’t retrieve it. If he could get that back, he might have time to help you out.
Gabriel is too big to fit through those bars and retrieve the sketch. So is the artist. There must be someone around here who’s small enough to get in there.
Ask the tap dancing little boy to help you out?he’s small enough to get in there and grab the sketch.
How do I get the tap dancer to help me?
He’s been dancing in the sun in front of that Doobie Dog cart all day. He could probably use a break. Try talking to him and see what he’s looking for.
Doing all that dancing in front of those tasty-looking hot dogs must’ve worked up an appetite.
Give the tap dancer a Doobie Dog and he’ll be glad to help you out!
How do I get a Doobie Dog?
Gabriel’s got no money to spare on hot dogs, and the vendor isn’t interested in talking. He’s too caught up in his book.
If Gabriel had something the man was interested in, maybe he could bargain for a hot dog.
In the cash register at St. George’s books you can find a gift certificate. Use the gift certificate on the Doobie Dog vendor. He’ll give you a hot dog in exchange.
What things do I need to do on Day 2?

Is the artist working on a project for you? Did you get thrown out by Malia? Did you visit the Voodoo Shop and Museum, look around there carefully, and talk to the owners? Did you ask Grace for research afterwards?

Get Mosely’s badge and the pattern file at the police station. Gain entrance to Malia’s home with something official and talk to Malia until she kicks you out. Get the artist in Jackson Square to agree to recreate the pattern for you. Visit the Dixieland Drug Store to see Madame Cazaunoux. Ask Grace to research Cazaunoux.
There are too many Cazaunouxs! How do I know which one is the right one?

Use the directory page with Gabe's bedroom phone and start making calls! You know you’re looking for a Madame, so you can write off the male Cazaunouxs. Do you remember anything else about the woman you saw in the drug store? Something you could pick up on over the phone as well?
Listen for the Cazaunoux who has a dog named Castro barking in the background.
Where do I get clay?
Clay, muck, mud, where do you usually find things like this?
Go to Lake Pontchartrain and get clay from the shore.
What things do I need to do on Day 3?

Did you make an impression with Madame Cazaunoux? Have you seen Malia today? Did you talk to Professor Hartridge and give him something to research? Have you found out what cabrit sans cor’ means? Did you get marks from Laveau’s tomb?

Read the paper to learn about the lecture at Tulane. Drop in on Mosely at the station . Get the veve from the artist in Jackson Square. Show Professor Hartridge the veve. Talk to the drug store owner to learn about cabrit sans cor'. Get the address for Madame Cazaunoux by making phone calls. Dress up as a priest to see Madame Cazaunoux. Tell her what cabrit sans cor’ means. Make an imprint copy of Cazaunoux’s bracelet. Go to St. Louis Cemetery to see Malia. Copy the marks on Laveau’s tomb into the sketchbook.
I’ve got Madame Cazaunoux’s number, but I don’t know where she lives.
She’s not going to tell you, and Willy won’t either. But maybe you can find another business she frequents, one where the people aren’t quite so paranoid.
Call Cajun Critters, and tell them you know Castro. The receptionist there will be happy to tell you where Madame Cazaunoux lives.
I’m at Madame Cazaunoux’s, but she refuses let me inside. How can I get her to talk to me?
She’s a very religious woman, and Gabriel is as far from that as you can get. But her eyesight isn’t the best, so maybe if Gabriel came back with a new look it would work.
Wear the priest’s collar, as well as the black shirt and hair gel that are in Gabe’s bedroom. Be sure to also bring your priestly manner and she’ll let you inside.
Where do I find a priest’s collar?
In a church, of course. But make sure no one’s looking.
Scare off the priest and you can take it from his confessional.
How do I get rid of the priest?
This particular priest isn’t made of very stern stuff. Gabe could probably tell stories that would make him very uncomfortable!
Tell the priest about Gabriel’s troubles with women and he’ll suddenly decide he has somewhere else he’d rather be.
What does cabrit sans cor’ mean?
Very few people seem willing to talk about it. But there is someone who knows what it means who loves the sound of his own voice. Ask him.
Professor Hartridge will tell you what it means.
How do I get Professor Hartridge to talk to me?
He is a bit of a snob. But he’s very interested in new information about Voodoo. Surely you have something that would interest him.
Show him the Reconstructed Veve pattern and he’ll open up.
Where do I get the Reconstructed Veve pattern?
From the person who said he would draw it for you yesterday.
Talk to the artist in Jackson Square.
I want to take Madame Cazaunoux’s bracelet. How do I get it?
Madame Cazaunoux would definitely notice if you took it. But there is another way to take the bracelet with you, in a manner of speaking.
Use the clay to make an impression of the bracelet while you’re blessing it.
I want to buy the crocodile mask from Willy, but I’m broke. Help!
Gabriel can get the money, but he’ll need to look to his family for help. One offer may even walk right through his door.
After asking about Willy Jr, go back to the bookshop and sell the painting to Bruno. Then go to St. Louis Cemetery and say hello to each of Gabriel’s ancestors.
What things do I need to do on Day 4?
Did you buy the crocodile mask? Did you talk to Gran about your family and their secrets? Did you help Sam win his game? Did you show Crash the bracelet?

Sell your father’s painting and get $20 at the cemetery so you can buy the crocodile mask. Watch Crash talk to the drummer from the overlook. Help Sam win his game to get the bracelet. Show the bracelet to Crash in the cathedral. Trace the tattoo on Crash’s chest. Search Gran's attic and learn about Heinz Ritter. Ask Gran about Ritter and Schattenjagers. Call Wolfgang . Take the Magentia Moonbeam flyer from the Voodoo museum, if you haven't yet. Ask Grace to research the reconstructed veve, if you haven't already.
How do I open this antique clock?

First, you’ll need the key?you can find that in the trunk. Then you’ll need to set it to right time and symbol. Take a look at some of Gabriel’s father's works. Notice any patterns of numbers or symbols?
Set the clock hand to 3 o’clock, and set the dragon image to 12 o'clock. Then turn the key and the drawer will open.
I can’t find the family tomb. Where is it?
Search around the cemetery.
From the area with Marie Laveau’s tomb, walk to the upper left.
Crash keeps walking away from me in Jackson Square! What do I do?
He’s seen Gabriel before and he doesn’t trust him. You’ll need to watch from afar to see what he’s up to.
Go to the Jackson Square overlook and use the rightmost set of binoculars to watch Crash in the Square.
How do I get Crash to open up?
He thinks you’re an outsider, so he doesn’t trust you. You need to show him something that will make him believe that you know more than just the official story.
Show him the snake bracelet and he’ll start talking.
How do I turn my clay mold into a real bracelet?
It would take a talented jeweler to make you a real one. Are you sure you don’t know someone like that?
Read the newspaper to see the ad for Sam Springleton. You can visit him at the Napoleon House.
Sam’s too busy losing at chess to help me.
Sam isn’t going anywhere until he finally beats Markus. He just needs a little luck. Someone else who watches him play a lot could help you help him.
Talk to the bartender about the bar patrons and Voodoo to find out what Sam’s problem really is. Then give Sam a little something extra to improve his game.
What can I give Sam so he’ll win the game?
He needs a drink to loosen up and get his confidence back.
Give Sam the Master Gamblin’ Oil you got from buying the animal mask and he’ll be able to win his game.
Crash is dead! Help!
Poor Crash. There’s nothing you can do to help him, but he can still help you if you take a closer look.
Remember that snake tattoo? Make a sketch of it in your sketchbook. It might come in handy later.
The Voodoo Murders case is closed! Now what do I do?
The police believe the case is closed, but you know better. You’ve got a friend on the force. Try talking to him.
Talk to Mosely about the deaths of Crash and Hartridge, and then ask him to reopen the case. He’ll tell you what it is he needs from you in order to reopen it.
What things do I need to do on Day 5?
Did you visit Hartridge? Did you visit the museum? Did you settle things with Mosely? Has Magentia Moonbeam helped you??

Find Hartridge’s notes on his desk at Tulane. Go see Magentia and get her to translate the Voodoo code. Also, ask her about St. John's Eve. Visit the Voodoo Museum. Go talk to Mosely and convince him to reopen the case. Ask Grace to research Rada drums, if you haven't yet.
How do I prove a real Voodoo cult exists?
You’ll need evidence that there is a cult and that the Voodoo involved is real.
Show Mosely the Reconstructed Veve pattern and Hartridge’s Notes.
How do I prove the Voodoo cult is a threat?
They’ve managed to stay away from being connected to the murders happening recently. But Gabriel knows this isn’t the first time they’ve killed people.
Show Mosely the Voodoo article about the murders in 1810.
How do I give Mosely a lead on the cult?
Gabriel found a very small but important clue at the Lake Ponchartrain crime scene. If he can link that clue to another person or place, that would be a good lead.
Show Mosely the matched snake scales from the crime scene and the Voodoo Museum.
I’m in the Voodoo Museum and this snake is trying to kill me! Help!
You’ve been reading and asking about snakes, right? There’s one thing everyone keeps mentioning about pythons and other constrictor snakes.
Pythons are very sensitive to vibration. Turn on the window fan to get rid of this one!
Where do I find a scale to match the one I found at the crime scene?
Did you visit the Voodoo Museum? Did you check in with Grace?
After the Voodoo Museum snake attacks you, Grace will take a scale from your face and place it in the ashtray on her desk.
Now Hartridge is dead! Why does this keep happening?!
There is an unfortunate pattern forming here. Why would anyone kill him? Take a look at his desk and you may learn something.
Use the pencil on the notebook page on his desk to find some important notes he called you about earlier today.
Moonbeam won’t translate the Voodoo code for me.
She only does that for a trusted friend. Ask her how you can prove yourself.
Moonbeam will show you her “Ask the Loa” machine. Set the machine to say “Trusted Friend” and she’ll translate it for you.
Moonbeam won’t give me a snake scale.
She’s peculiar, but she would notice if you tried to take that snakeskin right in front of her. Maybe if she was busy doing something else you could get away with it.
Ask her to show you how she handles Grimwald. While she’s busy, snatch the snakeskin out of the cage.
Someone killed a chicken in here! Help!
Things are heating up. It’s time to strike back and find out who’s behind all this. Did you know its St. John’s Eve? That’s a big day for Voodoo.
There’s going to be something going on tonight with the Voodoo cartel?everything Gabriel does today should be to find out who’s responsible for these murders.
Grace refuses to paint this tattoo on my chest.
You’ll have to convince her. Or just wear her down.
Tell her it’s for a costume party, and then go on about how you understand why she’s so jealous of Malia. That should do the trick.
What things do I need to do on Day 6?
Did you find where the Voodoo revelers will be celebrating tonight and how to get yourself accepted once you get there?

Have Grace paint on the snake tattoo. Break into Mosely’s office to get the tracker. Plant a tracker signal device in the coffin at the museum. Translate the drum code in Jackson Square. Leave a message on the Laveau tomb. Find the ceremony and hide your face to safely get inside.
I know something’s going down tonight, but I don’t know where.
You know the cartel has been using messengers to communicate. Chances are they’re using them to talk about tonight’s activities.
Decipher the Rada drum message in Jackson Square.
I know there’s a conclave in the bayou, but I still don’t know where exactly.
You’ll need to find a way to follow the revelers to their meeting place. Can you think of any way to track them through the swamp?
Get the tracker and signal device from Mosely’s office. You can use those to find the exact location of the ceremony.
What do I do with this key Mosely left me?
He wouldn’t have left you the key if he didn’t think it could be helpful or important. Why don’t you go take a look in his office and see?
The key unlocks his desk drawer, where he keeps two signal devices and a tracker. You’ll need those!
Frick refuses to let me into Mosely’s office?he even says Mosely doesn’t work there anymore! How do I get into his office?
You won’t be able to get in through the police station lobby. You’ll need to find another way around.
The alleyway beside the station gives access to Mosely's office, but you'll need to pry it open. Look at the car in front of the station to find a tire iron.
Okay, I’ve got the tracker. How do I get it to the ceremony?
This will be a two-step process. First, you need to plant the tracker on something. Second, you need to make sure that something makes it to the ceremony.
First, go to the Voodoo Museum and plant the tracker in the sekey madoule. Next, go to Marie Laveau’s tomb and leave a message on it to make sure the sekey madoule is brought to the ceremony.
How do I leave a message on Laveau’s tomb?
Once you get the two Voodoo messages translated, you need to write a simple message of your own to tell someone very specifically what you need them to do.
Use the brick on the wall and then leave the message “dj bring sekey madoule”
I’m at the bayou and the tracker was planted. Now what?
Turn on the signal device and follow the tracker!
No, really, that’s all. Follow the blips on the device through the bayou and you’ll locate the ceremony.
I don’t think I’m fully prepared for the Voodoo ceremony.

There are a few things you’ll need to do to enter the ceremony safely and without notice. You’ll need to disguise your identity, look like you’re one of them, and study up on your Voodoo trivia by reviewing the lecture from Tulane.

Have Grace paint the snake tattoo on Gabe’s chest. Then, put on the crocodile mask before entering the circle. Finally, when Doctor John quizzes you, answer "Damballah" to the first question and “Ogoun Badagris” to the second.
Malia is possessed by Tetelo, and she's in charge of the Voodoo cartel! Now what do I do?
Gabe is getting in over his head here. It’s time to call someone who’s got more knowledge on how to deal with this kind of thing.
Call Wolfgang and talk to him about Tetelo and the Ritter family history. You two can form a plan together.
Wolfgang mentioned the talisman might be here in New Orleans! Where should I look?
He said they’d be with Tetelo’s remains, right?
The Geddes have a mausoleum at the cemetery.
I’ve found the Gedde tomb, but it’s pitch dark in here!
Looks like the light bulb is broken. You’ll have to bring your own light in with you.
Take the flashlight from Gabriel’s bedroom with you.
One of the drawers in the Gedde tomb is locked. How can I open it?
There must be a key around here somewhere. Maybe hidden amongst the dead?
Some of those skulls in the ossuary stand out, don’t they? Maybe there’s a pattern to decipher here.
Press the skulls with gems to form the Sign of the Cross (N, S, W, E) and then press the center skull to unlock the drawer.
Someone killed Mosely! And then knocked me out and stole his body!
Things are getting really bad now. Search the tomb. Maybe they left something behind.
Look in the drawer where Mosely's body was found. His wallet has been left behind.
Tetelo’s remains aren’t in New Orleans. Grace keeps telling me how dangerous it is, but I don’t know where to go now.
Grace is right! It’s dangerous in this town, and you’ve run out of leads. It might be time to look further afield for help.
It’s time to go see Uncle Wolfgang. Call the travel agency on the C-page of the phonebook.
Gabriel's broke. How can I afford a trip to Germany?
Gabe is broke. But he knows someone who isn’t?and that someone doesn’t need that money any more.
Use Mosely’s credit card to pay for the trip.
I’m in Rittersberg, but Wolfgang’s gone. Now what?
There must be a way into Wolfgang's library. Gerde said it was only for Schattenjagers, though.
You’ll need to complete the Schattenjager initiation ceremony before you can get into the library. Take a look at the panels in the chapel and ask Gerde about them.
How do I become a Schattenjager?
The panels in the chapel explain the process?study them closely and then find ways to complete each step of the process.

First, open your bedroom window and wash your hands. Then use the scissors to cut your hair. Next, take the chamber pot, scroll, salt, and knife into the chapel with you. Put the chamber pot on the altar, the salt into the pot, then cut your arm with the knife. Then kneel and read the scroll.
What things do I need to do on Day 7?
Did you look for Tetelo’s remains? Did you go to Germany? Did you complete the initiation ceremony??

Talk to Wolfgang on the phone and then go check out the Gedde tomb. Take Mosely’s wallet and pay for a trip to Germany on his dime. Once there, learn about and complete the Schattenjager initiation ceremony.
I did the initiation and dreamt of the dragon, but I still can’t get into the library!
Remember that key you saw at the end of your dream? Seen that lying around anywhere?
The key is at the foot of your bed. Pick it up and use it!
Where do I start with this library?
It would be nice to get things in order before you get lost in all these books. Does anything look out of order to you?
Solving the Talisman puzzle will reveal the Schattenjager shrine. Here you’ll find a very useful book left behind by Uncle Wolfgang.
What should I do with this book I found?
These kinds of books often reference other books as sources. You should see if any of those other books are nearby.
Each book will directly reference another one. Keep looking at the shelves until you find what you’re looking for.
I got it! I know where Wolfgang went. But I can’t afford to get a ticket there.
How did you afford the trip to Germany?
Use Mosely’s credit card.
What things do I need to do on Day 8?
Did you figure out where Wolfgang went?

Open the library with the key. Complete the Talisman puzzle and find the Schattenjager shrine to get the first book. Keep following the recommended reading of each book until you figure out where Wolfgang went. Show the book to Gerde and hand her the credit card.
What do I do with all these tiles?
If you count them, there are 12 rooms in the snake mound. There are also 12 tiles?two of them are stuck in place already, but there are 10 you can pick up.
Place the tiles in the rooms in numerical order clockwise. For example, if you put Tile 1 in a room, then Tile 2 should go in the room north of it.
I’ve placed the tiles, but nothing’s happening.
Did you pick up anything else? Does the layout of this place remind you of anything?
Insert the snake rod into the hole in the tile in Room 3.
The mummies keep killing me! Help!
They’re vicious, but they’re not fast.
Walk around them and you can avoid being killed.
Now I’m in Room 6 and I’m surrounded by mummies!
Be resourceful! Study your surroundings carefully!
Grab the vine hanging down from the ceiling and force your way through!
Uncle Wolfgang is here, but we’re still surrounded!
Wolfy’s a smart and experienced man?ask him what to do.
Put the snake rod in the hole inside the gate.
We’re inside the inner circle, but the sacrificial table won’t open.
There has to be a way to open it in this room. Did you look closely at the table and what else is in the room?
Pick up the iron bars on the wall and place them in the table with Wolfgang’s help.
The table still won’t open. Wolfgang says it needs a heart.
Wolfgang told you what to do, so get to it.
Use your dagger on the dead mummy’s body.
Help! What do I do?
One two buckle my shoe
Three four shut the door
Five six pick up sticks
Where do I go?
Take a left at Brunswick Ave, then follow the strange little man in a gnome hat to the corner of Cough Syrup Lane and Castle Aaargh.
Then ask the policeman over there for directions.
Don't forget your towel!
Are you my mommy?
Do you really want to know?
물론이죠.
We can all be your mommy.

바깥쪽 원에서 나가는 문입니다.
저걸 만져야겠다는 생각은 들지 않아.

네에, 그렇군요.
아치 문은 내부 통로로 이어집니다.

잠겨 있습니다.
열려 있는 문입니다.

기둥에는 작은 조각들의 집합이 나타나 있습니다.

가브리엘이 훈포의 예술품을 어지럽힌다 해서 풀리는 건 없습니다.
방 안에 있는 두 번째 문입니다.
By the door is a keypad.
재밌군요. 엘리베이터의 옆은 고해성사실로 가는 입구처럼 보이지 않습니다만.
엘리베이터 문은 키패드로 엽니다.
엘리베이터 옆에 키패드가 있습니다.
엘리베이터가 대성당으로 돌아갔습니다. 이제 가브리엘은 갇혔습니다!
엘리베이터가 작은 로비 같은 곳으로 트여 있습니다.
No thanks. I went before I left.
누군가 온다! 그레이스, 누워!
That's all well and good, but what would I wear?
Grace is being kept in one of the hounfour's "guest" rooms.
This isn't much of a disguise. They'd see right through us.
가브리엘 나이트! 여기서 뭐하는 거냐?
Uh... I was confessing in the church, see, and...
Never mind. Now I can do what I've been waiting to do?kill you!
여기서 뭐하는 거냐?
이 방이 비어 있는 줄 알았소.
Go to the circle now!
가브리엘 나이트! 여기서 뭐하는 거냐? 같이 있는 놈은 또 누구냐?
Who, him? Oh, he's a friend of mine, see, and we were just...
너네 둘 다 죽여주마!
늑대라. 적절하네요.
<growl>
이 단검은 네가 가져가, 그레이스. 이게 필요할 거야.
뭔가 해야 될 상황이라면 태극권을 쓸게요, 가브리엘. 그 칼이 필요한 사람은 저보다 당신이에요.
이걸로 위장하고 싶어?
왜요? 저 사람들은 제가 여기 있는 줄 '알아요.' 예상치 못한 건 '당신'이고요.
This talisman is supposed to have some sort of power...
그레이스! 일어나, 그레이스!
What? What's... what's going on?
Gabriel?! Where are we? What's going on?
We're in the Gedde cartel hounfour, Grace. A ritual is about to begin, and I'm afraid YOU'RE the main course.
그래서 저 북이 울리는 거에요? 자면서도 저 소리가 들렸어요! 일어날 수가 없었다고요!
Yeah, makes you want to dance, don't they?
확실히 해요! 이제 어떻게 하죠?
계획이라. 알았어. 어떻게 하면 좋지?
<sigh> My hero. You know this place and these people better than I do, Gabriel!
좋아, 알았어. 그레이스, 녀석들은 네가 혼수상태라고 생각할 테니 계속 그런 척 해. 때가 되면 유리한 입장이 될 거야. 나는 다른 교인들과 같이 있어야겠어.
As for the ritual itself, I'd say Tetelo is our WORST problem. I remember from the bayou that she didn't show up until Dr. John blew that drug on Malia's face.
놈이 그걸 하기 전에 막으면, 테텔로가 나타나지 않게 될 것 같아.
어떻게 막을 생각이세요?
모르지. 좀 생각해 봐야겠어.
그래요. 만약 테텔로가 나타나면요?
그저 그런 일이 일어나지 않게 확실히 해야겠지.
더욱 걱정되는 건 테텔로를 제압한다고 해도, 존 박사가 우리 계획을 알아채면 누가 놈을 막지?
부적은 정령한텐 반응하지만, 존 박사는 순전히 뼈와 살이라구.
저야 모르죠. 만약에 테텔로가 말리아에게 씌이기 전에 막을 수 있다면, 그녀는 제가 처리할게요. 하지만 제가 그녀랑 존 박사를 둘 다 상대할 순 없어요.
그냥 시도해 보고 잘 되기를 비는 수밖에 없겠네요. 도와줄 사람이 많지 않다는 게 안타까워요.
All right, but don't hurt Malia, Grace. She's not in this of her own free will.
Yes, Gabriel. But what about you? You can't go out there looking like that.
This talisman is supposed to have some sort of power...
그레이스! 일어나, 그레이스!
What? What's... what's going on?
가브리엘! 모슬리! 여긴 어디에요? 무슨 일이고요?
We're in the Gedde cartel hounfour, Grace. A ritual is about to begin, and I'm afraid YOU'RE the main course.
그래서 저 북이 울리는 거에요? 자면서도 저 소리가 들렸어요! 일어날 수가 없었다고요!
Yeah, makes you want to dance, don't they?
확실히 해요! 이제 어떻게 하죠?
그래! 계획을 짜자! 우리가 어떻게 했으면 좋겠어, 가브리엘?
나한테 묻는 거야?
맙소사, 우린 위기에 처했어요!
뭐, 내가 전문가라는 걸 깨달았지만 우리가 직면한 상황에 대해선 우리보다 네가 더 잘 알고 있잖아.
Okay, okay, uh... Grace, they expect you to be unconscious, so you'd better fake it. That should put you in a good position when it's time. Mosely, you and I will be with the other ritualists.
As for the ritual itself, I'd say Tetelo is our WORST problem. I remember from the bayou that she didn't show up until Dr. John blew that drug on Malia's face.
놈이 그걸 하기 전에 막으면, 테텔로가 나타나지 않게 될 것 같아.
어떻게 막을 생각이세요?
모르지. 좀 생각해 봐야겠어.
그래요. 만약 테텔로가 나타나면요?
그저 그런 일이 일어나지 않게 확실히 해야겠지.
Okay. So you're going to prevent this spirit thing from showing up. Fine. I'll take care of the big guy, Dr. John, when the time comes.
And I can handle Malia herself?as long as she IS Malia.
Well... keep an eye on her for her own good. But don't hurt her!
Who, ME?
그럼 우린 네 신호를 기다릴게.
좋아요. 하지만 시간을 너무 끌지는 마세요.
기분이 어때, 그레이스?
Fine, but there's no time for chitchat now!
모슬리! 해냈구나!
다행이다! 네가 여기로 들어가는 줄 알았는데!
내가 엘리베이터에서 내리자마자 저 우라질 북소리가 시작되더니, 위에서 목소리를 들었어. 부두교인들이 떼거지로 몰려올 것 같아.
그레이스를 찾았어.
I see that. Check her out, then you and I need to find a way to blend into the woodwork, bud.
Hey, Mostly...
구하러 온 건 그만 감사해, 가브리엘. 우린 친구잖아?
자. 여기 위장복.

Uh... a wolf.
이 망할 말라깽이가!

좋아. 갈 준비가 됐으면 줘.
그레이스! 마침내 찾았어!

그레이스는 기절한 것 같지만, 괜찮습니다.

가브리엘은 인사불성인 그레이스를 심하게 다루지 않으려 합니다.
그레이스를 단검으로 찌른다고 해서 그녀가 혼수상태에서 깨어나진 못하겠지만, 깨어난다면 불쾌해할 게 확실합니다.
그레이스가 무의식인 중에 가브리엘이 옷을 입히려 한다면 당황할 겁니다!

가브리엘은 늑대 변장은 자기 껄로 쓰고 싶어합니다.
막대형 형광등이 침대 위에 달려 있습니다.
육중한 청동으로 만들어진 서 있는 램프가 골동품들을 비추고 있습니다.
No thanks. I went before I left.
거기에 누웠다간 절대 일어나지 못할 것 같아.
아마 일종의 접객실인 것 같아.
딱히 단조롭진 않은 침대가 이 방의 주요 특징입니다.
참 편안하겠군.

육중한 청동으로 만들어진 서 있는 램프가 골동품들을 비추고 있습니다.
안돼, 그레이스!
It's the witch-hunter! Get him, Dr. John!

이 침입자 자식이!

안 돼요, 가브리엘!

아아아아!
안돼, 그레이스!

아아아아!

나도 몰라!

모슬리?

나더러 어쩌라구?
나도 몰라, 서둘러!

뭐? 그걸 어떻게 쓰는지도 모르는데!
불구덩이입니다.

NO!!

As I said in my lecture, which I assume you actually listened to, is that animal masks?totems?are used extensively in most African Voudoun religions.
검은 부두교에 대한 당신의 견해를 들려주세요.
Well, like any religion, the beliefs can tend toward positive or negative ends?can be used for good or evil.
Christianity, for example, has its doppelganger, Satanism. Any time you attempt to set up an icon to explain evil, you invite some warped mind to worship it.
The same is true of Voudoun?there are those who are drawn by and desire personal power from the darker, bloodier Loa.
Can you give me an example of black Voodoo?
All right. There is a very secret, very dark cult in Haiti called the Cult des Morts?Cult of the Dead. Their primary Loa is Papa Nebo, Loa of the cemetery.
They practice a particularly disgusting form of necromancy?magic using the dead. They dig up corpses and use their decaying bodies for various spells and curses.
검은 부두교의 또 다른 예시를 들려주시겠습니까?
In tribal Africa there were?and still are?black bokors, shaman bent toward the dark, who not only practiced necromancy, but also human sacrifice.
검은 부두교에 대해 더 얘기해 주실 게 있습니까?
만약에 이 도시에서 정말로 숭배하는 세력이 있다면, 우리들 중 누구도 안전할 수 없다는 것만 명심하세요.
담발라에 대해 말해 주세요.
Damballah is one of the major Rada Loa?also known as Damballah Weddo. He is an ancient Dahomean rain god, often represented as a large boa constrictor.
Damballah is the most powerful and most violent of the Rada Loa. The Rada Loa are typically benevolent?as opposed, say, to the Petro Loa.
He is still worshipped heavily in Haiti, and when Voodoo first started in New Orleans, the early conclaves were reportedly based on the worship of the Great Zombi?the great serpent?Damballah.
Tell me more about Damballah.
다음 학기에 로아에 관한 광대한 강좌를 개설할 겁니다. 당신도 그들 중 하나를 들으시는 게 좋겠네요, 나이트 씨.
자신에 관해 말해보세요.
All right, Mr. Knight. I'm 35, a fully tenured professor at this University as well as a fellow at Cambridge. My doctorate was obtained at Syracuse?yes, Syracuse?in Religious Studies.
I'm an agnostic, but I find human belief systems fascinating. I specialize in African religions because I grew up there?my father was a Protestant missionary.
And I am heterosexual?when I practice sex at all?which isn't very often. Any other questions?
당신에 대해 정말로 자세히 알고 싶습니다.
저에 대한 기사는 제 책 표지의 추천사만큼 많이 쓰여 있습니다, 나이트 씨. 개인사를 알고 싶다면 읽어보시죠.

It's very rare. Most Voudoun practices do not include human sacrifice as a matter of record, but it IS theoretically possible?if that's what the gods demand.
For example, one of the chants I had translated for me from a Haitian ritual went like this...
"Mistress Erzulie, come and aid us. If a cock is demanded, we will give it..."
"If a bull will suffice, behold it. But if a goat without horns is required for sacrifice, oh, where will we find one?"
Erzulie is the gentlest of Loa, so they call on her for mercy. But I have seen grown and powerful houngan tremble before a possession by one of the more violent Loa?such as Papa Nebo.
Clearly, they are afraid that something of the sort will be ordered?or that the Loa will simply take it for themselves.

It looks like the lecture is just starting.
Voudoun is the tribal religion of Africa, but the name "Voudoun" is actually a banner heading, under which resides an entire body of distinct tribal belief systems.
The word Voudoun may sound familiar to you. What is known in the States as "Voodoo" is actually an amalgamation of African religious systems, Voudoun, and European religions, primarily Catholicism.

All of the sub-cults of African Voudoun have certain things in common. The most important is the worship of a pantheon of spirits, instead of the single deity that the Christian and Muslim systems have.
이 정령들 중 일부는 자연적이거나, 특정한 수단이나 장소와 연관되어 있거나, 이미 사망한 핵심 부족장들을 대표합니다.
This spirit-worship is what makes Voudoun so easily adaptable. With all these spirits, it's no problem to add a few more. Say, for example, the Virgin Mary.
아프리카의 부족사회가 절정이었을 때엔 전쟁이 흔했습니다. 한 부족이 다른 부족을 정복할 경우, 지배한 부족의 중요한 로아는 피지배 부족의 정령들 사이에 곧바로 추가되었습니다.
이를 통해, 수많은 부둔 종교들이 아프리카의 부족사회에 퍼지거나 혼합되었고, 신앙체계를 보강하면서 셀 수 없는 분파를 낳았습니다.

The basis for the Voudoun religion seems to be as old as man himself. It has much in common with many early pagan practices: animal totems, sympathetic magic, elemental spirits in the trees, the heavens, the bodies of the sick...
많은 사람들은 아프리카가 인류의 요람이라고 믿고 있습니다. 부둔의 몇몇 로아들은 에덴동산만큼이나 오래되었다고 추정됩니다.
We still can't explain some of the real power of these primal religions?and note, I said primal, not primitive! There are African bokors who baffle our scientists with their supernatural powers.
Now, let's discuss the elements of Voudoun...

During a Voudoun ceremony, celebrants are possessed by the Loa. This is called "being ridden." The human worshipper is seen as a horse, and the Loa, as the divine horsemen.
로아에게 지배된 사람은 그 정령의 특징을 갖게 되며, 사실상 보다 강력한 존재를 담는 그릇이 됩니다.
Some of the older, original Africa Loa include Damballah, the great serpent god; Erzulie, the "mistress of love"...
Papa Nebo or Gede, the lord of death; Agwe, the spirit of water; Legba, spirit of the crossroads; and the cruelest and most dangerous?Ogoun Badagris?the lord of destruction.

Voudoun temples are called hounfours. Their priests; houngan or bokors; their priestesses, mamaloa.

의식 집회 동안 입문자들은 보코르나 마말로아, 여제사장의 감독하에 춤을 추게 됩니다.
초기 아프리카 의식에서 토템이나 동물 가면 및 기호의 사용은 보기 드문 일이 아닙니다. 하지만 현재 가장 오래된 분파를 제외한 전부는 이 종교를 버렸습니다.

어딘가에 휘갈겨 쓴 걸 봤어요. 그냥 낙서인 것 같아요.
알겠습니다. 참, 경고하는 걸 잊었군요, 나이트 씨. 동네 공동묘지는 상당히 위험합니다. 노상강도와 문화파괴범들이 많죠. 제가 당신이라면 혼자 거기 가진 않겠습니다.

There were a variety of kings and queens at first?Voodoo priests and priestesses. But from about 1830 a single power emerged.
그 부두교 여왕의 이름은 마리 라보입니다. 수년간 뉴올리언스에서의 부두교를 집도했지요.
고대 부두교에 대해 말해 주세요.

그거 좋군요.
As you may know, Voodoo is a grassroots religion formed by the mixing together of many different African tribal religions and Anglo religions such as Catholicism or Protestantism.
달리 표현하자면, 아프리카의 노예 무역에서 비롯된 종교죠. 하지만 아프리카의 노예들은 미국만이 아니라 프랑스와 스페인이 플랜테이션을 경영하던 서인도 제도에도 수출되었습니다.
1803년까지 뉴올리언스는 프랑스의 영토였습니다. 당시의 프랑스계 크레올들은 수많은 아프리카 노예들을 소유하고 있었죠.
하지만 크레올은 노예들이 모이는 것을 허가하지 않았고, 현지에서 부두교를 태생부터 가르칠 기회를 주지 않았습니다.
또한 크레올은 서인도 제도에서 그 종교를 믿는 '부패한 우상숭배자들'이 노예들의 수출을 금지한다는 걸 알고 있었습니다.
고대의 부두교에 대해 더 설명해 주세요.
By 1817, the Voodoo activities were beginning to cause fear among the white slave owners. An ordinance was passed to forbid slave gatherings except in designated public areas at designated times.
The time was Sunday afternoons. And the place: Congo Square. The slaves and free people of color gathered to dance simulations of their Voodoo dances?right in sight of Creole society.
물론, 그들은 진짜 부두교를 위해 비밀 집회도 계속했죠.
그렇다면 어떻게 부두교가 뉴올리언스에 퍼진 겁니까?
미국의 입법부는 루이지애나를 사들인 이후 규제를 완화했습니다. 노예들은 집회를 가질 수 있게 허용됐죠. 또한 미국인들은 서인도 제도의 노예들을 금지하는 걸 철회했습니다.
Around the same time, a slave revolt occurred in Santo Domingo?what is now Haiti. Between the lifting of the ban and the Haitian revolt, West Indies slaves began pouring into New Orleans.
Some of them were free people of color?freed or escaped slaves. Some came with their white owners who were fleeing from the revolt.
서인도 제도에 있던 사람들이 여기 왔을 땐 무슨 일이 있었죠?
They brought Voodoo with them. The native slaves were more than enthusiastic about embracing it. It gave them POWER, Mr. Knight?if only in the form of a communal bond.
첫 번째 집회 장소는 세인트 존 바요우와 폰처트레인 호수의 해안가였습니다.
초창기의 부두교는 독실한 뱀 숭배자들이었고, 그들은 그레이트 좀비라 불리는 뱀을 받들었습니다.
What exactly is Hoodoo?
Hoodoo refers to magic folk traditions of the South.
Hoodoo is a bastard of Voodoo. Many of the gris-gris are similar, but Hoodoo does not have the religious aspects of Voodoo.
후두에 대해 더 알려주실 게 있습니까?
부두교에 더 관심을 가져주신다면 없겠죠.
후두는 시골의 민속문화를 연구하려는 사람들의 관심사입니다만, 당신이 진정한 부두교를 이해하는 데엔 도움이 안 될 겁니다.
말리아 게데가 영원히 내 것이 되었으면 좋겠어.
정말, 참말, 진짜로.
What was that?!
응? 아닙니다.
마리 라보에 대해 더 얘기해 주시죠.
파리의 미망인이 늙게 되자, 딸인 마리 그라피옹이 뒤를 이었습니다. 대다수의 사람들은 동일인물이라고 믿지요. 두 사람이 같은 시각을 장려하고 있기도 하고요.
파리의 미망인은 1881년에 사망했습니다. 마리 그라피옹은 그 이후 오랫동안 통치했죠.
After the death of the Widow Paris, other Voodoo queens surfaced, and by 1890, the cult was fragmented again. Marie Glapion just sort of... faded away.
Tell me about Marie Laveau.
There were actually two Marie Laveaus?mother and daughter. Most people thought they were the same woman. Her "continued youth" added to the mystique.
The original?the mother?was also known as Widow Paris. It was she that began the empire.
마리 라보에 대해 더 얘기해 주시죠.
뉴올리언스의 부두교를 확실하고 독특하게 정립한 사람도 마리 라보입니다.
She invented hundreds if not thousands of spells, potions, charms, and incantations. These form the basis of the modern practice?not to mention the folk tradition of Hoodoo.
마리 라보에 대해 더 얘기해 주시죠.
When the Widow Paris began to practice there were many Voodooiennes in the city. By 1830, she was Voodoo queen of all New Orleans.
파리의 미망인은 크레올 중에 귀부인들의 미용사였습니다. 또한 그 귀족들의 하인들에게 밀정짓을 하라고 돈을 줬죠. 이 두 가지를 통해, 그녀는 뉴올리언스에서 활동하는 모든 사람들에 대해 알게 되었습니다.
하지만 그녀는 그 정보로 영적 활동을 보이거나, 심지어 협박을 하지는 않았습니다.
마치 그녀를 동경하시는 것 같군요.
For a black woman in the mid-1800's to gain power is an incredible thing, Mr. Knight, however she achieved it.
마리 라보에 대해 더 얘기해 주시죠.
평신도도 이해할 수 있을 만한 정도로 마리 라보에 대한 건 전부 들으셨습니다.
마리 라보에 대해 더 얘기해 주시죠.
The Laveau tomb?where one or both of the Maries are believed to be buried?is in St. Louis Cemetery #1.
부두교도나 관광객들 모두에게 유명한 성소입니다.
저 자신은 정기적으로 공동묘지에 다녀옵니다.
그래요? 이번 주에도 가십니까?
아니오. 공동묘지는 일반인들에게도 열려 있으니까요.
마리 라보에 대해 더 얘기해 주시죠.
She kept a pet snake. Danced with it, too. She held traditional Voodoo ceremonies out by the lake.
She took herself seriously?very seriously?but she was not above selling tickets for her "events" to curiosity-seekers.
또한 돈을 벌려고 부두교를 사용한 것도 아니었죠. 그건 확실합니다.
하지만 만약 그녀가 다른 시대에 다른 업계에서 일했다면 사기의 대가보다는 사업의 천재로 인용되었을 겁니다.
아, 절 설득하지 않으셔도 됩니다. 전 생계를 유지할 수 있는 사람을 존중하니까요.
이 사람이 마리 라보겠군.
뒤쪽 벽에 터번을 쓴 여성의 멋있는 초상화가 있습니다. 가브리엘은 그녀가 누구인지 궁금했습니다.
뉴올리언스에서 매우 감탄하시는 게 있다면요?
이 도시의 진정한 문화라고 봅니다, 나이트 씨. 미국이라는 끔찍하리만큼 재미없는 동네에서, 뉴올리언스만이 발언권이 있습니다.
진정한 뉴올리언스 현지인처럼 말씀하시는군요.
뉴올리언스에 대해 더 얘기하실 게 있나요?

뱀에 관해 아는 게 있습니까?

아름다운 생명체입니다, 안 그런가요? 관광객들은 부두교에서 뱀들을 가지고 체험하는 것 같더군요.
저 뱀, 당신 겁니까? 당신의 부두교 의식에 저걸 씁니까?

대답했다고 봅니다, 나이트 씨.

부두교에서 가장 중요한 전야제 중 하나입니다.
뱀에 대해 아시나요?
세인트 존 전야제의 유래에 대해선 몰라서 유감이군요. 제가 아는 건, 부두교가 뉴올리언스에 오기 오래 전부터 의식을 집행하는 밤이었단 겁니다.
Do you know of anything... interesting going on this evening?
You mean St. John's Eve? Mr. Knight, I know of nothing that you would find... amusing.
질문을 좀 더 드려도 되겠습니까?

박물관 경영은 어떻습니까?
Those who truly seek to understand are few, Mr. Knight. But even one can be an audience.
Sounds about like MY shop.
이런 물건들은 어디서 다 긁어온 겁니까?

여기에 괴상한 인간들이 오진 않습니까?
You mean besides yourself? <chuckle>
허! 그래요, 나 빼고요!
전 그런 판단을 내리는 일에 상관이 없습니다, 나이트 씨. 여기에 오는 사람들은 모두 환영하니까요.
몸집이 크시군요, 안 그렇습니까? 나가서 일하시나요? 스포츠라도?
굳이 알고 싶으시다면, 농구를 하진 않습니다.
나요? 아뇨! 타고난 운동선수처럼 보이십니다만.
건강을 유지하는 방법을 찾을 뿐입니다, 나이트 씨. 어쨌든, 우리의 신체는 신전이거든요.
그레이스처럼 말하시네요. 걔하고 당신하고 엮어 줘야겠어요.

그 옷 멋지군요.

정말 훌륭한 곳을 마련하셨군요.

제가 재배한 과일을 남들이 수확하는 걸 보는 것처럼 기쁜 일입니다.
아무거나 듣고 싶습니다.

제가 참석할 만한 강연회가 또 있나요?

아무거나 듣고 싶습니다.
아시다시피, 전 원래 서인도 제도 출신입니다.

아무거나 듣고 싶습니다.
전 쉽사리 알려주지 않는 사람입니다. 사생활을 매우 중시하거든요.
박물관 일을 하는 사람치곤 너무 이상하지 않나요?

정말 마리아 게데를 모르십니까?

박물관 경영 외에 하는 일이 있습니까?
아니오. 박물관으로 부자가 된 건 아니지만, 물건이 많이 필요하지도 않습니다. 제 일생의 진정한 관심에 초점을 맞추고 싶은 겁니다.
부두교 박물관을 개장한 동기가 뭡니까?
The subject has fascinated me all my life?and I wanted to help preserve the cultural heritage it represents.
동물 가면에 대해 아는 게 있습니까?

검은 부두교에 대해 아는 게 있습니까?

당신은 담발라를 믿으시나요?

아니오, 모릅니다.
Do you know anything about veves?
아이티의 부두교와 관계가 있다고 생각합니다만, 그건 제 전공이 아닙니다.

그 주제에 대해선 제가 아는 게 없어서 유감이군요.

부두교에 대해 정말 얘기할 게 없으십니까?

Voodoo is a popular bogeyman, Mr. Knight, especially in New Orleans. Anyone can pretend to use it, just as anyone can pretend to be a black belt in karate, and for the same reason: to intimidate.
전 시내의 부두교에 대해 잘 알고 있습니다, 나이트 씨. 장담하지만, 살인사건과는 관계없습니다. 경찰에서도 살인사건은 현지 부두교와 상관이 없다고 말했잖습니까.
그럼 부두교 살인사건에 대해선 아무것도 모르신다는 건가요?

Offerings of fruits to the Voodoo deities.
An African statue laden with decorations.

존 박사의 체격을 생각하면 권할 만한 게 아닌 것 같습니다.

안녕하십니까, 존 박사.
저희에게 돌아오시니 반갑습니다, 나이트 씨.
낡고 닳아빠진 환풍기가 창문에 달려 있습니다. 지금은 조용합니다.
